outputs.output_descr: Provide substantive and secretariat support to the UNDMT in undertaking activities on emergency preparedness, response and risk reduction. The UNRC has delegated the chairmanship of the UNDMT to a lead UN agency (UNICEF) however the 10 UN agencies comprising the UNDMT contribute to the RC's Office where the joint UNDMT budget is maintained. Activities include UNDMT meetings, support to NDMA in conduct of emergency management exercises in the country, support to emergency response and relief in disaster affected states, support to coordination, sectoral planning and lessons learnt documentation, conduct of conferences on disaster risk reduction and climate change adaptation.

project_descr: Support to Resident Coordination activities in India.
